acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Was in Johnston Memorial Library in 1976.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: James A. Estes Jr. was born in Nansemond County Virginia. He graduated from the Virginia Normal and Collegiate Institute in 1901. After graduation he worked in Nansemond County as a letter carrier and then became a public school teacher.
